about.details:
Incorporated in 2004, Shalby Limited is Ahmedabad, Gujrat based one of the leading multi-specialty chain of hospitals in India. Company provides inpatient and outpatient healthcare services through 8 fully operational hospitals with an aggregate operational bed count of 781 beds. Company also provides outpatient consultative healthcare services through 3 hospitals and 68 Outpatient Clinics. Company has 8 shared surgery centers within third party hospitals.

Shalby hospitals are well known for its orthopaedic services. Shalby Hospital had a 15% market share of all joint replacement surgeries conducted by private corporate hospitals in India in 2016. Apart from a focus on orthopaedics, Shalby hospitals provide advanced levels of care across various specialties such as neurology, cardiac care, critical care, oncology, and nephrology.

Since March 2007, Shalby hospitals have conducted an aggregate of 84,579 surgeries, and provided healthcare services to an aggregate of 923,441 patients, consisting 121,576 inpatients and 801,865 outpatients.

Shalby hospitals operate across five states and Outpatient Clinics operate across 53 cities in 16 states in India. Company also has six Outpatient Clinics and one Shalby Arthroplasty Centre of Excellence (SACE) in Africa, and two SACE in the UAE.

Shalby hospital is led by Dr Vikram Shah, an orthopaedic surgeon with more than 25 years of professional experience. Dr Vikram Shah is one of the promoters of the company.

As of December 31, 2016, Shalby hospital employed 1,599 employees and engaged 267 professional consultants, consisting 242 doctors who are full-time consultants and 25 doctors who are part-time consultants. Hospital's staff strength also comprises 458 nurses and 1,141 paramedical, corporate and support staff and pharmacists.

faqs.question: What is the Shalby Hospital IPO?
faqs.answer:
Shalby Hospital IPO is a main-board IPO of equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹504.80 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹248 per share. The minimum order quantity is 60.

The IPO opens on December 5, 2017, and closes on December 7, 2017.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Shalby Hospital IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Shalby Hospital IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Shalby Hospital IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Shalby Hospital IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Shalby Hospital IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Shalby Hospital IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Shalby Hospital IPO opens on December 5, 2017 and closes on December 7, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Shalby Hospital IPO?
faqs.answer: Shalby Hospital IPO lot size is 60, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,880.

faqs.question: How to apply for Shalby Hospital IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Shalby Hospital IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Shalby Hospital IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Shalby Hospital IPO will be done on Tuesday, December 12, 2017, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, December 14, 2017. Check the Shalby Hospital IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Shalby Hospital IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Shalby Hospital IPO listing date is on Friday, December 15, 2017.
